column4: After re-installing my PC ~10 times these last days I really need help now. Is it possible to get the proprietary ATI driver working with a HD 6870 and Ubuntu 12.10?
sudo apt-get install fglrx fglrx-amdcccle; sudo aticonfig --initial
So the linux-source/header part. Should I skip that?
it should be pulled in as a dep
